Title: toMonday
Description: Rounds down a date or date with time to the nearest Monday. Returns the date.
value - a Date, Date32, DateTime or DateTime64
The date of the nearest Monday on or prior to the given date. Date.
Examples: SELECT    toMonday(toDateTime('2023-04-21 10:20:30')), /* a Friday */    toMonday(toDate('2023-04-24')), /* already a Monday */
